com.tsatsatzu.subwar.game.logic.ai

Class SimplePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsatsatzu.subwar.game.logic.ai.SimplePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComputerPlayer

    public class SimplePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IComputerPlayer
    The Class SimplePlayer. This is a basic AI for running the robotic players. If it has no target, it listens or pings. If it still has no target, it just wanders. If it does have a target, it moves towards it. When it is within a straight line of it, it fires. If it happens to be on top of it, it moves to the side first.
